Class AeSimpleMD5

java.lang.Object
  it.apice.sapere.api.internal.AeSimpleMD5

public final class AeSimpleMD5
extends Object

Utility class which provides an MD5 hash hex string.

Taken from http://www.anyexample.com/programming/java/ java_simple_class_to_compute_md5_hash.xml.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Detail

calculateMD5

public static String calculateMD5(String text)
                           throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                  UnsupportedEncodingException

Calculates MD5 hash of the provided string.

Parameters:
text - The text to be hashed
Returns:
The hex string representing the hash
Throws:
NoSuchAlgorithmException - No MD5 hashing algorithm implementation is available
UnsupportedEncodingException - Cannot use UTF-8 (strange)
